text: Va [ej pajomʙar, jod kun] hangome ki Alloh taolo az kasone, ki kitoʙi [osmoni] ʙa onon doda suda ʙud, pajmon girift, ki: "Hatman, [omuzahoi hidojatʙaxsi] onro ʙaroi mardum ʙajon namoed va [on ciro, ki nuʙuvvati Muhammad xaʙar medihad] kitmonas nakuned"; va [-le] on [ahd]-ro pusti sari xes andoxtand [ʙad-on tavaccuhe nakardand] va ʙa ʙahoi andake [hamcun molu maqom] furuxtand.
